name: Froggo's adventure
description:
This is the first game i made with Pygame. The game has only 6 levels and i hope those aren't too hard for you. The source code and assets are also included in the zip file, you can use and modify them in anyway you like (None of the audio files are made by me, only the sprites are).

This game isn't available for Linux or Mac, but you can download the source code and play it that way.

Controls:

z key - run

x key / space key - spit tongue

arrow keys - move
